alert.note: Alert for Columbia; McDuffie (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 7:33PM EDT until July 15 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL MCDUFFIE AND WEST CENTRAL COLUMBIA COUNTIES... At 732 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Thomson, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Thomson, Appling, Thomson-McDuffie County Airport, Sweetwater Park, McDuffie County Fire Department, Thomson Fire Department, McDuffie Regional Medical Center, University Hospital McDuffie, White Oak Campground, Boneville, Columbia County Jail, Carpenter Airport, Patriots Park and Ansley Mill. This includes Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 168 and 189. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
